easy.q: I have a tail, but I’m not a kite. I hum when I’m happy and I’m always in sight. What am I?
easy.hint: Think of something that wags when excited.

medium.q: I am a word of letters three; add two, and fewer there will be. What word am I?
medium.hint: A tiny number with three letters.

hard.q: Two friends start at opposite ends of a road that is 1 km long. Each walks toward the center at the same speed. Where do they meet and why does the distance between them stay the same until they meet?
hard.a: They meet in the middle; the distance between them decreases as they approach but is always equal to the remaining distance until meeting.
hard.hint: Consider symmetry and relative motion on a line.
